Web InterfaceÂ¶

Documentation for the ISB-CGC web app is available from within the web-app. After you sign-in, click on the down-arrow next to your name in the upper-right corner and select “Help”.

  • User Dashboard
    • Create a Cohort
    • Create a general visualization
    • Create a SeqPeek visualization
    • Batch operations on cohorts and visualizations
    • Set operations on cohorts
    • Cohort listing
    • Visualization listing
    • SeqPeek visualization listing
    • Search for cohorts and visualizations
    • Sorting of cohorts and visualizations
  • Cohorts
  • Visualizations
  • SeqPeek
  • IGV-Browser
  • Sharing
  • General Permissions
